title: Bobby Admits He Didn’t Like A Gift from Amy…So We Share the Worst Christmas Presents We’ve Ever Received + A Member of the Show Had a BUNCH of Money After Being HACKED + Why Amy is “Mom of the Year”…
itunes:title: Bobby Admits He Didn’t Like A Gift from Amy…So We Share the Worst Christmas Presents We’ve Ever Received + A Member of the Show Had a BUNCH of Money After Being HACKED + Why Amy is “Mom of the Year”…
description:
Bobby takes to a caller who got a Christmas present from her husband that was not what she wanted at all. He reveals there was a Christmas gift from Amy he got that he didn’t love…and how he reacted. We find out the story behind why a member of the show is out a bunch a money after being HACKED! Amy explains why she deserves the title “Mom of the Year”. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
